translations.modules.error.circuit_breaker.descriptio: Protect against cascading failures with circuit breaker pattern
translations.modules.error.circuit_breaker.label: Circuit Breaker
translations.modules.error.circuit_breaker.output.__e: Only count these error codes toward threshold (empty = all)
translations.modules.error.circuit_breaker.params.act: The action to protect with circuit breaker
translations.modules.error.circuit_breaker.params.cir: The action to protect with circuit breaker
translations.modules.error.circuit_breaker.params.fai: Unique identifier for this circuit (for state tracking)
translations.modules.error.circuit_breaker.params.fal: Alternative action when circuit is open
Alternative action when circuit is open
translations.modules.error.circuit_breaker.params.suc: Successful requests needed in half-open to close circuit
translations.modules.error.circuit_breaker.params.tra: Static value to return when circuit is open
translations.modules.error.fallback.description: Provide fallback value when operation fails
translations.modules.error.fallback.label: Fallback
translations.modules.error.fallback.output.used_fallb: Result from primary operation or fallback
translations.modules.error.fallback.params.fallback_o: Alternative operation to execute on failure
Static value to return on failure
translations.modules.error.fallback.params.include_er: Error codes that trigger fallback (empty = all errors)
translations.modules.error.fallback.params.log_fallba: Include original error information in output
translations.modules.error.retry.description: Wrap operations with configurable retry logic
translations.modules.error.retry.label: Retry
translations.modules.error.retry.output.__event__.des: Timeout for each attempt (0 for no timeout)
translations.modules.error.retry.params.backoff_multi: Multiplier for exponential backoff (e.g., 2 doubles delay each retry)
translations.modules.error.retry.params.jitter.descri: Add random jitter to delay to prevent thundering herd
translations.modules.error.retry.params.jitter.label: Backoff Multiplier
translations.modules.error.retry.params.max_retries.d: The operation to retry (module ID and params)
translations.modules.error.retry.params.operation.des: The operation to retry (module ID and params)
translations.modules.error.retry.params.retry_on.desc: Add random jitter to delay to prevent thundering herd
translations.modules.error.retry.params.timeout_per_a: List of error codes to retry on (empty = retry all)
